ComicInfo.Summary:
FULL-THROTTLE!!!
HIGH-OCTANE!!!
WIDE-SCREEN ACTION!!!
A city has gone dark. Four heroes stand against chaos. And the odds are stacked against them. Without their Skills and down a man, a noble team of Agents fights to bring law and order to a near-future metropolis in the grip of a powerful enemy. As riots spread and violence escalates, the Agents' training will be put to the test. But help is on the way! And maybe-just maybe-the odds are about to shift in the favor of justice! The adrenaline-fueled, larger-than-life world of CRACKDOWN comes to life in the penultimate chapter of the hit video game series' first comic book mini-series.
